overview: Djalioh is a strange person.  Born in Brazil, he moves to France at 16 and presents himself non-conventionally as the "family's idiot". Misunderstood by society, he suffers for loving Adele who is set to marry his cousin Paul that raised him. A free adaptation of Flaubert's short story "QuidQuid Volueris", written when he was 16.
title: Djalioh
